abstracts.cdata!:
The project would support a lending
            program to industrial export enterprises to finance the cost
            of importing working capital items and machinery and
            equipment. The project would also include technical
            assistance to assist the Government in the evaluation of
            sub-projects, and in the preparation of an export expansion
            program and studies on the effective level of protection for
            domestic industries. The loan would have three components,
            namely: an imported working capital component of US$24.5
            million, a medium- and long-term investment financing
            component of US$10 million and a technical assistance
            component of US$0.5 million.
